title: 11 out of 14 consumer cyclical stocks deliver EPS wins this week: Earnings Scorecard
content:
iQoncept/iStock via Getty Images

The consumer discretionary/cyclical sector was in focus this week as investors accessed earnings reports from companies including Tesla ( TSLA ) and General Motors ( GM ).

The consumer discretionary/cyclical sector rose nearly 7% so far this year, compared to the 15% rise in the broader S&P 500
meta_description: Get the latest consumer discretionary sector earnings recap, with key insights on Tesla, GM, Ford, and upcoming reports.
